group_1.textCenter: I mean, even if they each have their own reasons,
it's wack they're ignoring all my calls and texts, no?
Like, there's gotta be at least a little time to reply,@right?
Look... Even you're not saying anything back now!
C'mon... Say something nicer to this cutie!
'Cause I... I've got no one else but you...
You say we'll wait and see...
But it's totally gonna be the same old pattern,@y'know...
Not like this is the first time
that I got abandoned by people precious to me,@anyway...
Hey, it was also like that back then, no?
I mean, that time we first talked...

group_1.narration: "I had a bigger ego back then than I do now,@and more often than not, I was like super blind@to the feelings of those around me."
"I was always pushin' my friends around,@so they'd get fed up with me, avoid me,@and then cut me off..."

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, this toy! I've been wanting to play with it@for ages!★
At least lend it to me for a little bit, 'kay?
We're friends, y'know.

group_1.textRight: ...You always say that, Himena-chan, but you@never give it back...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:801600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What, why?!
[chara:801600:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]I don't get it...!
All I asked was for her to lend me something.
Why are they making it sound like this cutie's@the bad guy here...?!
[chara:801600:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Don't look at me, idiot!
...You think it's my bad too, dontcha?
Knew it...!

group_1.textRight: I mean, what they said is true...

group_1.textLeft: That can't be...

group_1.textRight: but the girl whose toy you took was crying...
And I think she was scared, because when she@asked for it back, you got angry...

group_1.textLeft: ...I didn't know...
It's because I'm scaring people away that they're@all leaving...
[chara:801600:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]You're amazing!
You know people so well and you're so smart.
Like, cute lil' me had no idea I was scaring@everyone away.
Hey, I wanna know more about you!
You're...Hiko-kun, right? Be friends with me,@Hiko-kun!
Then this cutie'll teach ya all about it!

group_1.textRight: You usually make your friends cry, though...?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:801600:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Uh...
Then, from now on, I'm gonna become a good@friend who doesn't make anyone cry.[chara:801600:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy] Kyaha!★

group_1.textCenter: I didn't get to make up with my friends back@then, but...
I made friends with you instead, yeah?
Yup, I'm also glad I was able to talk with ya back@then.
